parameters.name: {{ $json.clientName }} - GHL Sub-Account Setup
parameters.content: Complete GoHighLevel sub-account setup following the chronological checklist. Sub-Account ID: {{ $json.subAccountId }}

parameters.jsCode:
const clientData = $input.first().json;

const tasks = [
  {
    name: "1. Integrations",
    content: `**INTEGRATIONS SETUP**

• Google Business Profile
• Facebook Ads
• Google Ads
• QuickBooks
• Payment Process
• 3rd Party Apps

Client: ${clientData.clientName}
Sub-Account: ${clientData.subAccountId}`
  },
  {
    name: "2. Website",
    content: `**WEBSITE SETUP**

• Landing Page
• Standard Terms and Conditions
• Standard Privacy Policy
• Domain Setup

Resource: How to use the Domain Connect feature

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "3. Phone System",
    content: `**PHONE SYSTEM & A2P REGISTRATION**

• A2P Registration
• Need EIN: ${clientData.ein || 'COLLECT FROM CLIENT'}
• Need Support Email: ${clientData.supportEmail || 'COLLECT FROM CLIENT'}

Resource: A2P 10DLC Brand Approval Best Practices

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "4. Pipelines",
    content: `**PIPELINE SETUP**

⚠️ PRESENT EXACT PIPELINES AND SEE WHAT DIFFERENCES THE CLIENT LIKES

Make sure to include all numbers for chronological order

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "5. Custom Field Folders",
    content: `**CUSTOM FIELD FOLDERS**

• New Project Questionnaire (Intake)
• Qualification Questionnaire
• On-Site Consultation Questionnaire
• Design Questionnaire
• Pre-CW Questionnaire
• Post-CW Questionnaire

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "6. Custom Value Folders",
    content: `**CUSTOM VALUE FOLDERS**

• Calendar Links
• Form/Survey Links

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "7. Forms/Surveys",
    content: `**FORMS & SURVEYS**

• Calendar Forms
• Qualification Forms (based on client's qualification process)
• On-Site Consultation
• Shakedown/Project Prep Meeting
• Pre-Construction Walkthrough
• Post-Construction Walkthrough
• Project Photoshoot Checklist

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "8. Custom Values + Trigger Links",
    content: `**CUSTOM VALUES & TRIGGER LINKS**

• Save surveys as custom values
• Save custom values as trigger links with UTM parameters
• Format: ?contact_id={{contact.id}}
• Example: {{custom_values.landscaping_job_outcome_survey}}?contact_id={{contact.id}}

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "9. Add Users",
    content: `**ADD USERS TO SUB-ACCOUNT**

• Add owner
• Add all users to sub-account BEFORE creating calendars
• COLLECT ALL CONTACTS + PHONE + EMAIL

⚠️ Must complete before creating calendars

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "10. Calendars",
    content: `**CALENDAR SETUP**

Set up as service calendars. Create calendar groups first, then add calendars with different colors.

**Calendar Groups:**
• Consultation Calendar Group
• Construction Calendars Group

**Calendars:**
• On-Site Consultation (Light Blue)
• On-Site Project Presentation (Dark Green)
• Pre-Construction Walkthrough (Dark Red)
• Post-Construction Walkthrough (Purple)
• Project Photoshoot (Dark Blue)

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "11. Estimate & Invoice Settings",
    content: `**PAYMENT PROCESSING SETUP**

• Setup Stripe account if needed
• Connect payment processor
• Turn auto invoice on

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "12. Automations + Tag Setup",
    content: `**AUTOMATION WORKFLOWS**

• Sales Automations
• Job Management
• Project Stacking
• Review Management
• Schedule Review Post in Social Planner

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "13. Dashboards",
    content: `**SALES DASHBOARD SETUP**

• Top Row: Opportunity Status, Value, Conversion Rate
• Second Row: Sales Funnel
• Third Row: Lead Source Report
• Fourth Row: GBP
• Fifth Row: Facebook + PPC Reporting
• Sixth Row: Sales Efficiency

Resources:
• How to Edit a dashboard
• Edit widgets on the dashboard

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "14. Custom Reports",
    content: `**CUSTOM REPORTING**

• Create and schedule reports

Resource: How to create and schedule reports

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "15. Domain Setup",
    content: `**DOMAIN CONFIGURATION**

• Connect existing domain OR
• Buy new domain

Resources:
• How to use the Domain Connect feature
• How to Purchase Domain Step by Step

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  },
  {
    name: "16. Email System",
    content: `**EMAIL INFRASTRUCTURE**

• G Suite Setup
• Dedicated Subdomain Setup

Resource: How to Set Up a Dedicated Sending Domain

Client: ${clientData.clientName}`
  }
];

return tasks.map(task => ({
  json: {
    ...task,
    clientData
  }
}));
